fullDescription.intro:
This node can be used to load git log from file (offline version) or directly from git repository (online version). Currently only offline operation is supported
To use the offline version of plugin you need to generate git log in a specific format using the following command:
git log --pretty=format:"%H%n%ct%n%an%n%B%n%H" --raw --no-merges --abbrev=40
in the folder with your local git repository. Result of this command should be saved in file on your disk and this file's path needs to be given in "Selected file" field in configuration dialog.
Please check workflow examples here or inside plugin jar.
